location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Colonel William Earle, Government House, Calcutta to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter asking for Pelly's thoughts on the services of Colonel Samuel Hennell, and whether they were sufficient to give his son any special claim upon the Viceroy for a nomination to the Staff Corps.A postscript to the letter notes Earle's regret at the news that Pelly is having to take leave owing to his health.
